title: Diamond Emerald Peacock Vaddanam - A Royal Waist Belt (Odyanam)
features: Intricately designed vaddanam featuring a central peacock motif. The peacock is embellished with ruby eyes, surrounded by dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. A central teardrop shaped emerald is also set on the piece. The intricate filigree design is complemented by a delicate row of South Sea pearl drops, adding a touch of regal elegance. The piece boasts traditional South Indian craftsmanship, with each diamond meticulously set for maximum brilliance.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece for any special occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance.
description: This exquisite vaddanam is a true heirloom piece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The central peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and good fortune. The combination of brilliant-cut diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and lustrous South Sea pearls creates a stunning visual impact. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece showcases exceptional quality and timeless appeal. A perfect investment in your jewelry collection, destined to be cherished for generations.
